Dataloader¶

CustomDataset¶

class src.models.dataloader.CustomDataset(s_inputs: ndarray, g_inputs: ndarray, m_inputs: ndarray, obs_targets: ndarray, augment: int, device: str)¶

create_train_val_idx¶

src.models.dataloader.create_train_val_idx(xds: Dataset, val_rate: float) → Tuple[List, List]¶

Compute a stratifate Train/Val split.

Parameters:

  • xds (xr.Dataset) – Dataset used for the split.

  • val_rate (float) – Percentage of data in the validation set.

Returns:

return list of train index & list of val index

Return type:

tuple[list, list]

transform_data¶

src.models.dataloader.transform_data(xds: Dataset, m_times: int = 120, test=False) → Dict[str, ndarray]¶

Transform data from xr.Dataset to dict of np.ndarray sorted by observation and augmentation.

Parameters:

  • xds (xr.Dataset) – The Dataset to be transformed.

  • m_times (int, optional) – Length of the time series for Weather data, defaults to 120.

  • test (bool, optional) – True if it is the Test dataset, defaults to False.

Returns:

Dictionnary of all data used to construct the torch Dataset.

Return type:

dict[str, np.ndarray]

get_dataloaders¶

src.models.dataloader.get_dataloaders(batch_size: int, val_rate: float, device: str) → Tuple[DataLoader, DataLoader, DataLoader]¶

Generate Train / Validation / Test Torch Dataloader.

Parameters:

  • batch_size (int) – Batch size of Dataloader.

  • val_rate (float) – Percentage of data on the Validation Dataset.

  • device (str) – Device where to put the data.

Returns:

Train / Validation / Test Dataloader

Return type:

tuple[DataLoader, DataLoader, DataLoader]
